topic.title: Paragraph in MDITA
topic.shortdesc: In MDITA, a paragraph consists of one or more consecutive lines of text, separated from surrounding elements by one or more blank lines.

section.title: Example
section.pre:
We need a good paragraph on a subject that becomes a leitmotiff for the LwDITA spec.
We need a second paragraph on a subject that becomes a leitmotiff for the LwDITA spec.
